title: AquaSense
excerpt: An IoT-powered system for betta fish water quality monitoring, engineered to ensure optimal health through continuous temperature tracking. It uses a DS18B20 sensor for real-time data, logging to Google Sheets, and providing LED alerts for proactive water management.

challenge: The core challenge was to develop a reliable IoT system for continuous betta fish water temperature monitoring, directly addressing the critical impact of water quality on their health and vibrant appearance. Key hurdles included ensuring precise temperature measurement with the DS18B20 sensor, establishing seamless data transmission to Google Sheets, and designing intuitive LED indicators for actionable water status alerts. The goal was to transform complex environmental factors into simple, real-time insights for better fish care.
solution: The solution is an IoT-powered Betta Fish Water Quality Monitoring System, designed to provide continuous, real-time insights into aquarium conditions. It employs a DS18B20 waterproof temperature sensor for accurate data acquisition, which is then seamlessly transmitted to Google Sheets for ongoing record-keeping and analysis. A distinct feature is the LED indicator system, which visually alerts users to optimal water conditions or the need for a water change. This system empowers users with proactive control over water quality, ensuring optimal betta health and paving the way for future smart aquarium technologies.
